description: Notification to signal switchover/failover.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcSwitchoverTrap HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx u 9999 HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcNodeInfo s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcSwitchReason s EXAMPLE

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group. 0 is an invalid value.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName

description: This object contains node identification information
where the switchover occurred.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcNodeInfo

description: This object contains the cause for switchover.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcSwitchReason

description: Notification to signal the failed interface recovered.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcFailIfRecoverTrap HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx u 9999 HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName s EXAMPLE IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group. 0 is an invalid value.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Notification to signal the failed interface generated.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcFailIfGenerateTrap HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx u 9999 HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName s EXAMPLE IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group. 0 is an invalid value.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupIdx

description: Unique identifier of this redundancy group.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-RDDC-MIB::hpnicfRddcGroupName

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr
